Replying to @brucel 2019-08-15 17:49
@brucel @eleven_ty @Netlify You can create build hooks via the Deploy Settings section of any site's admin page in Netlify. Adding a button in Google Sheets means adding it as a drawing, and assigning it an action (which can be a script in Sheets which does anything, including make a post request)

Replying to @brucel 2019-08-14 19:10
@brucel @eleven_ty Thanks Brucey! Since you don't want to rebuild/deploy on every keypress, but more likely at a chosen moment when the editor say "publish please", I like add a button to the sheet which POSTS to an HTTP build trigger. On @Netlify you create and name them, like these on my site: https://t.co/bB2bRN3UFw
